metadata.synopsis: Lia will defend her fellow tieflings to the death. She does not shy away from violence and is prepared to fight ever druid in the grove if it means saving her people.
metadata.how_to_trigger: from crashsitein reCon: teleport S_GLO_ProdigySisterclick on Lia, go through dialogue and convince them to stay and fight oe startdruidattackteleport S_GLO_ProdigySisterclick on Lia

0.speaker: Lia
0.text: I'm glad we were here - who knows what would have happened otherwise?
0.context: NodeContext: You'll defend your fellow tieflings to the death - grim, determined and ready to fight
